pr_title: HDDS-2816. Fix shell description for --start parameter of listing keys

timeline.message: HDDS-2816. Fix shell description for --start parameter of listing keys

timeline.bodyText:
To be consistent with volume list and bucket list, can you please replace the space between the two sentences with a newline?

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                  description = "The key to start the listing from. " +
          
          
            
                  description = "The key to start the listing from.\n" +
          
      
    
    
  

For reference:
https://github.com/apache/hadoop-ozone/blob/8f3a42f35826aa59ceb2748bf64dca51e548a1bb/hadoop-ozone/ozone-manager/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/ozone/web/ozShell/volume/ListVolumeHandler.java#L53-L56
https://github.com/apache/hadoop-ozone/blob/8f3a42f35826aa59ceb2748bf64dca51e548a1bb/hadoop-ozone/ozone-manager/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/ozone/web/ozShell/bucket/ListBucketHandler.java#L53-L56
timeline.author: adoroszlai

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/hadoop-ozone/ozone-manager/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/ozone/web/ozShell/keys/ListKeyHandler.java b/hadoop-ozone/ozone-manager/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/ozone/web/ozShell/keys/ListKeyHandler.java
index fd1eec6ee..8d699d1d3 100644
--- a/hadoop-ozone/ozone-manager/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/ozone/web/ozShell/keys/ListKeyHandler.java
+++ b/hadoop-ozone/ozone-manager/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/ozone/web/ozShell/keys/ListKeyHandler.java

@@ -50,7 +50,7 @@
   private int maxKeys;
 
   @Option(names = {"--start", "-s"},
-      description = "The key to start the listing from. " +
+      description = "The key to start the listing from.\n" +
               "This will be excluded from the result.")
   private String startKey;

timeline.message: HDDS-2816. Replace the space between the two sentences with a newline
